mapper.insert: insert into day_value ( id, company_code, start_price, end_price, rate, total_money, huan_shou, date, create_time )values( #{id}, #{companyCode}, #{startPrice}, #{endPrice}, #{rate}, #{totalMoney}, #{huanShou}, #{date}, #{createTime} )

insert into day_value ( id, company_code, start_price, end_price, rate, total_money, huan_shou, date, create_time )values ( #{item.id}, #{item.companyCode}, #{item.startPrice}, #{item.endPrice}, #{item.rate}, #{item.totalMoney}, #{item.huanShou}, #{item.date}, #{item.createTime} )

update.foreach:
update day_value set id=#{item.id}, company_code=#{item.companyCode}, start_price=#{item.startPrice}, end_price=#{item.endPrice}, rate=#{item.rate}, total_money=#{item.totalMoney}, huan_shou=#{item.huanShou}, date=#{item.date}, create_time=#{item.createTime}
where id=#{item.id}
